title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 130.2 - Quarantined area

N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 130.2 - Quarantined area

State Regulations

The following counties, cities or towns, or parts thereof, of the State of New York are declared to be quarantined areas. (a) The cities and towns of: Clinton County
